dc:title: Discovery Festival Highlights 2015
dc:creator: Discovery Festival: Monique Koopmans and Maureen Voestermans
dc:contributor: I. Alev Degim, James Johnson, Tao Fu
PublishingLab team: Jess van Zyl, Josip Batinic, Joana Chicau, Inte Gloerich, Gottfried Haider, Anatasia Kubrak, Margreet Riphagen, Léna Robin, Karina Zavidova
dc:subject: digital media, festival, Discovery festival, music, new ideas, research, art, science, nieuwe ideeën, wetenschap.
dc:description: Discovery Festival is the most progressive and most mature science / art / music festival in the Netherlands. These are the festival highlights of 2015.
